fr.skyost.skyowallet.util

Class Skyupdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.skyost.skyowallet.util.Skyupdater

  • public class Skyupdater
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple auto-updater.
    Please follow this link to read more about checking for updates in your plugin : https://www.skyost.eu/Skyupdater.txt.

    Thanks to Gravity for his updater (this file uses some parts of his code) !

      Info type enumeration.
      static class  Skyupdater.Result
      Represents the updater's result.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Skyupdater

        public Skyupdater(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                  int id,
                  java.io.File pluginFile,
                  boolean download,
                  boolean announce)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException
        Initializes Skyupdater.
        Parameters:
        plugin - Your plugin.
        id - Your plugin ID on BukkitDev (you can get it here : https://api.curseforge.com/servermods/projects?search=your+plugin).
        pluginFile - The plugin file. You can get it from your plugin using getFile().
        download - If you want to download the file.
        announce - If you want to announce the progress of the update.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - I/O error.
        org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException - If there is a problem with Skyupdater's config.

      • getLatestFileData

        public final org.json.simple.JSONObject getLatestFileData()
        Gets raw data about the latest file.
        Returns:
        A JSON object which contains every of the update process.

      • compareVersions

        public static boolean compareVersions(java.lang.String versionTo,
                                      java.lang.String versionWith)
        Compares two versions.
        Parameters:
        versionTo - The version you want to compare to.
        versionWith - The version you want to compare with.
        Returns:
        true If versionTo is inferior than versionWith.
        false If versionTo is superior or equals to versionWith.
